content: Who's the provider? Microsoft and gmail both copy sent messages automatically to Sent and Sent Mail, respectively, independent of TB settings.
creator: sfhowes

content:
takimoto224, you can make a reply in your existing thread on this instead of creating a brand new thread as a reply.

To reply in a thread that is not locked, scroll down to Post a Reply box, type in your reply then click on Post Reply.

Your thread is https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1457973
creator: James
